sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛...➛Employee Name,

We are pleased to officially welcome you.  We are excited to have you join

our team and look forward to your contributions.

We would like to inform you that we have scheduled your onboarding on 

 Trigger➛...➛Joinng Date at Trigger➛...➛Location.

To help you get started, we have prepared an onboarding plan that includes

an introduction to our company culture, meetings with key team members,

and a comprehensive overview of your role and responsibilities.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛...➛Employee Name,

We are pleased to officially welcome you.  We are excited to have you join

our team and look forward to your contributions.

We would like to inform you that we have scheduled your onboarding on 

 Trigger➛...➛Joinng Date at Trigger➛...➛Location.

To help you get started, we have prepared an onboarding plan that includes

an introduction to our company culture, meetings with key team members,

and a comprehensive overview of your role and responsibilities.
